channel.title: Ragefire-Empire 2.0 - Gameplay you'll Enjoy, Content to keep you Satisfied!
channel.description:
[center].:: Ragefire-Empire Official Server Thread ::.[/center]
[img]http://topg.org/gallery/360915/3330.png[/img]
[center].:: A message to New Players ::.[/center]
It's advised for your own gaming experience, that you give Ragefire-Empire a try.
[center].:: Does Ragefire-Empire have enough content ::.[/center]
Ragefire-Empire has a list of features that only grows. Some quick features to note: 100+ Tasks, Player owned shops, custom weapons, custom bosses, custom player vs monster combat, custom player vs player combat, a friendly community, gambling, and so much more!
[center].:: Will I be happy to be apart of the Ragefire-Empire Community ::.[/center]
You will be ABSOLUTELY pleased. The staff members are helpful and understanding. Rules are strictly enforced to ensure a positive environment. The owner dedicates most of his time to fixing the game and adding new content. You will not regret joining Ragefire-Empire!
[center][url=http://ragefire-empire.net/]http://ragefire-empire.net/[/url][/center]
[center].:: Media ::.[/center]
[center][img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2qntijn.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/OSS0Ex1.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/JC63rB4.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/veu6vP7.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/5tSXBE8.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Gg72RKl.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/5BxGAA3.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/D7sHoOd.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UDNU5ER.png[/img][/center]
[center]PLAYER SATISFACTION GUARANTEED[/center]

[center].:: A message to New Players ::.[/center]

It’s advised for your own gaming experience, that you give Ragefire-Empire a try.

[center].:: Does Ragefire-Empire have enough content ::.[/center]

Ragefire-Empire has a list of features that only grows. Some quick features to note: 100+ Tasks, Player owned shops, custom weapons, custom bosses, custom player vs monster combat, custom player vs player combat, a friendly community, gambling, and so much more!

[center].:: Will I be happy to be apart of the Ragefire-Empire Community ::.[/center]

You will be ABSOLUTELY pleased. The staff members are helpful and understanding. Rules are strictly enforced to ensure a positive environment. The owner dedicates most of his time to fixing the game and adding new content. You will not regret joining Ragefire-Empire!
